result.reason: Feature request for 'Zoom' (scaling remote content) and 'Presentation Mode' (distraction-free UI), which improves usability during demonstrations.
result.approach: Implement a 'Presentation Mode' toggle in FrmMain to hide UI panels and menus, and investigate adding zoom controls for RDP/VNC sessions.
